messages.title: Keep our local M.P. working for Romford!
messages.content: As your M.P. for the past fourteen years, I am proud to have represented my home town in the U.K. Parliament. Romford is my home and always will be. This is where I have lived all my life. I am a truly local person who cares about our community and understands what matters to local people. That is why I hope to continue to be able to work for Romford as your representative in the House of Commons. To do so, I need your support on Thursday 7th May 2015.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to have represented my home town in the U.K. Parliament.

politicalExperience.achievements: representing Romford in the U.K. Parliament

contactInformation.address: 1 Pettits Close, Romford, Essex RM1 4EB / 85 Western Road, Romford Essex RM1 3LS

images.caption: Photos of Andrew Rosindell engaging with constituents and participating in community events.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is mainly a personal appeal for support without detailed policy positions or mention of specific issues such as Brexit, governance, or health.
